app.title: GoatChat - AI Chatbot
app.description:
【 ASK ANYTHING 】

Here are some ideas you can Goat Chat AI, powered by AI, to write for you:

Stories, poems, song lyrics, scripts
Language practice & Text translation
Information about anything
Food recipes
Dad jokes
1-week trip plan to Japan
What to watch
Code, math equations
and many more!

【 GET INSTANT ANSWERS 】

Thanks to “Goat Chat AI”s powerful AI capabilities, backed by AI technology, you can get answers to any question instantly. From historical events and scientific facts to obscure trivia and pop culture references, Goat Chat AI has the knowledge you need at your fingertips.

【 WRITE ANYTHING EFFORTLESSLY 】

Need help writing? “Goat Chat AI”s AI-powered writing assistant, utilizing AI, can help you generate ideas, write outlines, and even compose entire paragraphs. Tackle any writing task with ease.

【 GET CREATIVE 】

Unleash your creativity with Goat Chat AI, driven by AI. Write a poem, rap song lyrics, or a story.

Write a rap song in the style of Drake
Rewrite Yesterday’s Lyrics by Beatles
Write a poem about love

【 PRACTICE ANY LANGUAGE 】

“Goat Chat AI”s multilingual capabilities, powered by AI, mean that you can chat in any language you want. Translate text, learn and practice your language. Goat Chat AI to act as a teacher!

【 CHAT ABOUT ANY TOPIC 】

Goat Chat AI, your AI-powered chatbot, is your go-to source for chatting about any topic you want. Whether you’re interested in sports, politics, science, or anything in between, Goat Chat AI is always up for a chat.

【 HAVE THE MOST HUMAN-LIKE CHAT 】

You’ll feel like you’re chatting with a friend. “Goat Chat AI”s friendly, conversational tone and personalized recommendations, based on AI, make it easy to chat about anything, from the mundane to the profound.

【 PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS 】

"Goat Chat AI," utilizing AI, offers personalized recommendations based on your preferences and interests. Whether you're looking for a new book to read, a movie to watch, or the best local restaurant, our smart chatbot will provide tailored suggestions for a truly unique experience.

【 BRAINSTORM IDEAS WITH EASE 】

Stuck on a project or need inspiration? Chat with "Goat Chat AI," which utilizes AI, to brainstorm ideas and develop innovative solutions. Our AI-powered chatbot can help you think outside the box and approach problems from different angles, making the creative process a breeze.

【 EXPLORE CAREER ADVICE 】

Thinking about a career change or need guidance on professional development? "Goat Chat AI," powered by AI, can provide you with valuable career advice, job search tips, and information on various industries. Make informed decisions about your future with the help of our knowledgeable chatbot.

【 STAY UP TO DATE WITH THE LATEST TRENDS 】

Never miss out on the latest trends and news. "Goat Chat AI," backed by AI, keeps you updated on everything happening in the world. From the newest gadgets and tech to the latest fashion and pop culture, our AI chatbot has you covered. Stay informed and in the know with "Goat Chat AI."

【 IMPROVE YOUR SKILLS 】

Looking to develop new skills or enhance your existing ones? "Goat Chat AI," leveraging the power of AI, can provide you with helpful resources, tips, and advice on various subjects. From learning a new programming language to improving your cooking abilities, our AI chatbot can guide you every step of the way.

Experience the future of AI with "Goat Chat AI" – the most advanced, free chatbot available on Google Play. Download now and start chatting with the smartest AI around, based on the power of AI!

app.summary: AI Chat+Writer Assistant. Chatbot app writer based on GoatChat API!

reviews.text: It works well but you have to pay a high price to sends any more than like 5 or 8 messages. It also lost half my chat when i got out of the app. You also cannot copy and paste messages. I wanted to use this as a tool to help me write a book so not super helpful. Other than that its good i just think its way to expensive personally. Like just under $30 a month. I would pay for it they fixed the issues i mentioned and made it a little cheaper

Seems fine, but as far as I can tell, its premium only. The wording on it made it sound as if a weaker version was free with ads, but I've yet to have any ads, and waiting for the server to clear up doesn't seem to work (and is likely a fake justification for premium given that deleting the apps data gives your free 10 messages back.)

I am a subscriber and use this pretty frequently. Most times it's pretty great. I had used it to scan external links for products and provide analysis as well as a review summary? For whatever reason today it says it can't do that. Things like this happen often and can be really frustrating. Bumping a star off for that. I've also had times where I was supposed to get priority yet got kicked off due to traffic. One major issue with the app is that its difficult to copy, paste, or edit like openai

This app suffers from very poor planning. After only sending six messages I kept getting a message about "unsafe content" that locked me out so I couldn't talk to the bot anymore. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app but not only did it not fix the issue, it also deleted my access/ownership to my bot so can no longer monitor or edit it.

Would love to give it five stars. It's just some minor inconveniences that pile up enough to sometimes really worsen the overall experience. One example that's particularly frustrating is that after you type in your prompt and execute it, sometimes the app will 'randomly' show you a message saying that too many users are using the chat right now and to try later. That's not the frustrating part, rather it's the fact that it'll delete the prompt you just wrote, forcing you to re-write again.

I cannot recommend GoatChat enough! This app is the ultimate AI chatbot assistant that is completely free and uses the amazing ChatGPT technology to answer any question, search the web, and even write emails for you. It's like having a smart and efficient personal assistant right at your fingertips! One of the most impressive things about GoatChat is how seamlessly it integrates with other platforms. For example, if you're doing research for a project and need to quickly look up something on Go

Heavy and fast paywall. I get it, running and maintaining an AI is expensive. I would maybe be okay if the result would be satisfactory but it just feels the AI is running in circle and barely scratching the surface. On top of that, there is no place where to keep your conversations, so it disappears.

I just can't stop raving about GoatChat! This is the most amazing free app I've ever used. I'm absolutely in love with how ChatGPT, the incredible AI assistant, is always available to answer all my questions and even help me search the web like Google or Bing. One of my favorite examples of GoatChat's awesomeness was when I needed to send an important email, but I was too busy to type it out myself. I simply asked ChatGPT to write the email and in no time, it was done! It saved me so much time

I tried out GoatChat on the Appstore and I have to say, it's the best AI chatbot assistant out there! Not only can it answer any question you throw at it, but it can also search the web like Google and Bing. Plus, it's totally free! I was blown away by how helpful ChatGPT was. I asked it to find me the best pizza place in town and it gave me a list of the top-rated restaurants with their menus and reviews. It even helped me book a reservation at my top pick

I guess those trying to learn or need help with programming will be limited. Says that it will assist you but when it comes to programming, it is very hesitant. Not like I was asking for information on how to change it's own program. It does seem to give examples and assists in generating enough scripting though so, as long as it is up to date. Most of these are not up to current info so with scripting, the syntax has changed too much for those A.I. bots will pay if this one is more up to date

app.developerLegalAddress: AVENIDA BRASIL, 17 - PISO 8 F, 28020 MADRID, Spain
app.AIReview:
GoatChat - AI Chatbot Review

Overview

GoatChat – AI Chatbot is a productivity app aiming to provide instant answers and creative writing assistance through an AI-powered chatbot interface. With over 1,098,601 installs and a solid 4.46 rating from 44,968 users, the app has clearly found a receptive audience seeking readily available information and content generation tools. The core promise – “【 ASK ANYTHING 】” – is broadly appealing, covering areas like writing, translation, factual knowledge retrieval, and even generating creative prompts. The app’s summary, "AI Chat+Writer Assistant," hints at its dual functionality, positioning it as both a conversational AI and a tool for content creation, which is a key differentiator in the increasingly crowded chatbot landscape.

Key Features

  • AI-Powered Chatbot: The fundamental feature is an AI chatbot leveraging an unspecified “GoatChat API.” This suggests integration with a more robust backend AI engine than simply relying on a generic conversational model.
  • Diverse Query Types: Users can interact with the chatbot to:
    • Generate creative content (stories, poems, song lyrics, scripts).
    • Practice language and translate text.
    • Obtain information across various domains (history, science, recipes, etc.).
    • Receive prompts for specific tasks (1-week trip plan to Japan, movie recommendations, code generation, mathematical equations).
  • Writer Assistant Mode: Beyond simple question answering, the app offers a writer assistant mode, presumably designed for generating content based on user prompts. This expands its utility beyond just retrieving information.
  • Instant Response System: The app’s description emphasizes “【 GET INSTANT ANSWERS 】,” suggesting optimized response times crucial in maintaining user engagement with a chatbot.

Strengths

  • Broad Functionality: GoatChat's versatility is one of its strongest assets. The sheer range of topics it can address – from complex mathematical equations to crafting silly dad jokes – immediately demonstrates the potential power of the underlying AI. This broad applicability makes it appealing to a wide demographic of users.
  • Free Accessibility: The app’s free price point removes a significant barrier to entry, allowing anyone to experiment with the technology and assess its value without financial commitment. With 1,098,601 installs, this demonstrates strong initial adoption.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Despite the powerful AI behind it, the app's interface appears relatively simple and straightforward. The focus on direct questioning lends itself to a clean and uncomplicated user experience.
  • Positive User Feedback: A 4.46 rating indicates significant user satisfaction, suggesting the core functionality is delivering on its promises for a substantial portion of its user base.

Areas for Improvement

  • API Transparency: The reliance on a “GoatChat API” without specifying details raises concerns. Users would benefit from knowing more about the underlying AI model – its training data, limitations, and capabilities. This opacity could lead to disappointment if users have unrealistic expectations.
  • Response Quality Variability: Given the broad scope of queries, it’s likely that response quality will vary significantly. The app needs clear mechanisms for reporting inaccurate or unhelpful responses to aid in ongoing model refinement. A robust feedback system is essential.
  • Content Generation Limitations: While the writer assistant mode is a valuable addition, early users may find the generated content requires significant editing and refinement. The AI’s creative output isn't guaranteed to be polished or original without human intervention.
  • Lack of Advanced Features: Compared to more established chatbot apps (e.g., ChatGPT), GoatChat appears to lack advanced features like image generation, voice input/output, or the ability to maintain context across extended conversations.

User Experience

The user experience is primarily centered around the chat interface. Navigation is intuitive – users simply type their questions and receive responses. The app's speed of response appears generally quick, contributing positively to the overall experience. However, the lack of visual aids (e.g., charts, graphs) when presenting information could be improved, particularly for complex topics like mathematical equations or trip planning. A more visually engaging design would enhance usability and make it easier to digest information. The app's performance is crucial; occasional lag or slow response times could detract significantly from the user experience.

Value for Money

As a free app, GoatChat offers considerable value for casual users seeking quick answers or basic content generation assistance. The broad range of features accessible without cost makes it an attractive option for experimentation and learning about AI chatbots. However, its long-term value hinges on the continued quality and improvement of the underlying AI model. If the API continues to deliver high-quality responses consistently, and if new features are added, the app’s value will only increase.

Conclusion

GoatChat – AI Chatbot represents a promising entry into the rapidly evolving chatbot market. Its broad functionality, free accessibility, and positive user ratings suggest it has successfully captured the attention of many users. However, concerns regarding API transparency, response quality variability, and the lack of advanced features necessitate careful monitoring and ongoing development. The app's success will depend on its ability to consistently deliver accurate information and compelling creative content while addressing areas for improvement – particularly around refining the underlying AI model and enhancing the user experience with additional features. Ultimately, GoatChat has the potential to become a valuable productivity tool, but it needs sustained investment and refinement to truly stand out in a competitive landscape.
